item.title: Filter by asset type, bulk delete assets, and import assets into collections in Microsoft Purview
item.description:
Our latest release, Manage access to business assets via collections, also makes it easier to work with assets in Collections. In case you missed it:
You now get a full page for working with assets. This used to be a small panel. Finally, some breathing room! If you're a data curator, you can now bulk-delete assets from a collection.
3. You can now import business assets directly into a collection. This isn't available for physical assets yet, but is coming in the future.
4. You can filter business assets by asset type. This filter also makes it easier to create a list of assets you'...
